item.title: Hello World!
item.author: aaron@thequant.ca (Aaron Janeiro Stone)
item.description: I am Aaron Janeiro Stone, and I am building this website as a place to share my thoughts on quantitative finance, open source software, and other topics that interest me. Moreover, I hope to use this space to share some of my own projects and developments. I currently am a Quantitative Analyst at VirgoCX, a cryptocurrency exchange based in Toronto, Canada. My work is mainly in market making, algorithmic trading, and quantitative research.
